thread.title: See how Boston newspapers celebrated the Pats' win
thread.title_full: See how Boston newspapers celebrated the Pats' win

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: See how Boston newspapers celebrated the Pats' win
text:
See how Boston newspapers celebrated the Pats' win The mood was very different in Atlanta. Post to Facebook See how Boston newspapers celebrated the Pats' win The mood was very different in Atlanta.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/atlanta-boston-super-bowl-51-new-england-patriots-win-front-pages/   See how Boston newspapers celebrated the Pats' win Luke Kerr-Dineen , USA TODAY Sports 7:46   
If you're waking up on Monday morning having watched the Super Bowl as a neutral, reeling from a brilliant game and wondering how each set of fans must be feeling right now, there's no better place to look than the daily newspapers in each state. It's a perfect reflection of the local mood. 
In Georgia it was, as you might expect, pretty downcast. There was the Savannah Morning News . 
The Aiken Standard (in neighboring South Carolina). 
And, of course, the hometown Atlanta Journal-Constitution. 
The mood, as you might expect, was far different in Massachusetts, starting with the Boston-area Metro edition. 
The Boston Herald . Read  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/atlanta-boston-super-bowl-51-new-england-patriots-win-front-pages/ Most Popular
